title: Rahul Gandhi says ‘deep state’ eating Indian state, much like in Pakistan - Times of India
content:
1. Rahul Gandhi says ‘deep state’ eating Indian state, much like in Pakistan  Times of India
  2. "Dangerous When...": Rahul Gandhi Accuses BJP Of Allowing Company Raj  NDTV
  3. Rahul Gandhi says 'PM doesn't listen'; slams BJP, RSS with 'Sone ki Chidiya' dig  Hindustan Times
  4. Rahul Gandhi's statement in London comes under category of sedition: MP Minister Vishvas Sarang  Times of India
  5. 'India not in good place': Rahul's all-out attack on PM Modi; Calls out BJP & RSS ideology in London  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi attacked BJP and RSS on Friday for “destroying” India’s institutions and “polarising” the country, saying BJP has “spread kerosene all over the country and all it needs is one spark”.“The deep state, the CBI and ED, is now chewing and eating the Indian state much like what happened in Pakistan,” he said in a speech to a conference of business people, MPs and academics in London. “A soul without a voice means nothing and what has happened is that India’s voice has been crushed by an ideology and and crushed by the institutional framework of our country itself, which has become parasitical,” the Congress leader said.
